play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Not marching now in fields of Thrasymene,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Where Mars did mate the Carthaginians;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nor sporting in the dalliance of love,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In courts of kings where state is overturn’d;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nor in the pomp of proud audacious deeds,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Intends our Muse to vaunt her heavenly verse:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Only this, gentlemen,—we must perform

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The form of Faustus’ fortunes, good or bad:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To patient judgments we appeal our plaud,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And speak for Faustus in his infancy.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now is he born, his parents base of stock,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In Germany, within a town call’d Rhodes:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Of riper years, to Wertenberg he went,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whereas his kinsmen chiefly brought him up.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So soon he profits in divinity,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The fruitful plot of scholarism grac’d,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That shortly he was grac’d with doctor’s name,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Excelling all whose sweet delight disputes

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In heavenly matters of theology;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Till swoln with cunning, of a self-conceit,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: His waxen wings did mount above his reach,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And, melting, heavens conspir’d his overthrow;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For, falling to a devilish exercise,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And glutted now with learning’s golden gifts,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: He surfeits upon cursed necromancy;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nothing so sweet as magic is to him,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Which he prefers before his chiefest bliss:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And this the man that in his study sits.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Settle thy studies, Faustus, and begin

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To sound the depth of that thou wilt profess:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Having commenc’d, be a divine in shew,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet level at the end of every art,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And live and die in Aristotle’s works.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sweet Analytics, ’tis thou hast ravish’d me!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Bene disserere est finis logices.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is, to dispute well, logic’s chiefest end?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Affords this art no greater miracle?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then read no more; thou hast attain’d that end:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A greater subject fitteth Faustus’ wit:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Bid Economy farewell, and Galen come,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Seeing, Ubi desinit philosophus, ibi incipit medicus:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be a physician, Faustus; heap up gold,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And be eterniz’d for some wondrous cure:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Summum bonum medicinae sanitas,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The end of physic is our body’s health.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, Faustus, hast thou not attain’d that end?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is not thy common talk found aphorisms?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Are not thy bills hung up as monuments,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whereby whole cities have escap’d the plague,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And thousand desperate maladies been eas’d?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet art thou still but Faustus, and a man.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Couldst thou make men to live eternally,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Or, being dead, raise them to life again,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then this profession were to be esteem’d.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Physic, farewell!  Where is Justinian?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Si una eademque res legatur duobus, alter rem,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: alter valorem rei,c.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A pretty case of paltry legacies!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Exhoereditare filium non potest pater, nisi,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Such is the subject of the institute,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And universal body of the law:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: This study fits a mercenary drudge,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who aims at nothing but external trash;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Too servile and illiberal for me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: When all is done, divinity is best:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Jerome’s Bible, Faustus; view it well.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Stipendium peccati mors est.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The reward of sin is death:  that’s hard.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Si peccasse negamus, fallimur, et nulla est in nobis veritas;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: there’s no truth in us.  Why, then, belike we must sin, and so

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: consequently die:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, we must die an everlasting death.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What doctrine call you this, Che sera, sera,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What will be, shall be?  Divinity, adieu!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: These metaphysics of magicians,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And necromantic books are heavenly;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lines, circles, scenes, letters, and characters;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, these are those that Faustus most desires.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, what a world of profit and delight,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Of power, of honour, of omnipotence,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is promis’d to the studious artizan!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: All things that move between the quiet poles

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Shall be at my command:  emperors and kings

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Are but obeyed in their several provinces,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nor can they raise the wind, or rend the clouds;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But his dominion that exceeds in this,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Stretcheth as far as doth the mind of man;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A sound magician is a mighty god:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here, Faustus, tire thy brains to gain a deity.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Wagner, commend me to my dearest friends,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The German Valdes and Cornelius;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Request them earnestly to visit me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I will, sir.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Their conference will be a greater help to me

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Than all my labours, plod I ne’er so fast.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, Faustus, lay that damned book aside,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And gaze not on it, lest it tempt thy soul,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And heap God’s heavy wrath upon thy head!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Read, read the Scriptures:—that is blasphemy.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Go forward, Faustus, in that famous art

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Wherein all Nature’s treasure is contain’d:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be thou on earth as Jove is in the sky,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lord and commander of these elements.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How am I glutted with conceit of this!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Shall I make spirits fetch me what I please,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Resolve me of all ambiguities,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Perform what desperate enterprise I will?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll have them fly to India for gold,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ransack the ocean for orient pearl,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And search all corners of the new-found world

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For pleasant fruits and princely delicates;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll have them read me strange philosophy,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And tell the secrets of all foreign kings;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll have them wall all Germany with brass,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And make swift Rhine circle fair Wertenberg;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll have them fill the public schools with silk,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Wherewith the students shall be bravely clad;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll levy soldiers with the coin they bring,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And chase the Prince of Parma from our land,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And reign sole king of all the provinces;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yea, stranger engines for the brunt of war,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Than was the fiery keel at Antwerp’s bridge,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll make my servile spirits to invent.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, German Valdes, and Cornelius,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And make me blest with your sage conference.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Valdes, sweet Valdes, and Cornelius,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Know that your words have won me at the last

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To practice magic and concealed arts:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet not your words only, but mine own fantasy,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That will receive no object; for my head

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But ruminates on necromantic skill.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Philosophy is odious and obscure;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Both law and physic are for petty wits;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Divinity is basest of the three,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Unpleasant, harsh, contemptible, and vile:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: ’Tis magic, magic, that hath ravish’d me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then, gentle friends, aid me in this attempt;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And I, that have with concise syllogisms

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Gravell’d the pastors of the German church,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And made the flowering pride of Wertenberg

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Swarm to my problems, as the infernal spirits

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: On sweet Musaeus when he came to hell,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Will be as cunning as Agrippa was,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose shadow made all Europe honour him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus, these books, thy wit, and our experience,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Shall make all nations to canonize us.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As Indian Moors obey their Spanish lords,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So shall the spirits of every element

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be always serviceable to us three;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Like lions shall they guard us when we please;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Like Almain rutters with their horsemen’s staves,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Or Lapland giants, trotting by our sides;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sometimes like women, or unwedded maids,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Shadowing more beauty in their airy brows

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Than have the white breasts of the queen of love:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: From Venice shall they drag huge argosies,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And from America the golden fleece

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That yearly stuffs old Philip’s treasury;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If learned Faustus will be resolute.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Valdes, as resolute am I in this

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As thou to live:  therefore object it not.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The miracles that magic will perform

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Will make thee vow to study nothing else.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: He that is grounded in astrology,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Enrich’d with tongues, well seen in minerals,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hath all the principles magic doth require:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then doubt not, Faustus, but to be renowm’d,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And more frequented for this mystery

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Than heretofore the Delphian oracle.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The spirits tell me they can dry the sea,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And fetch the treasure of all foreign wrecks,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, all the wealth that our forefathers hid

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Within the massy entrails of the earth:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then tell me, Faustus, what shall we three want?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nothing, Cornelius.  O, this cheers my soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, shew me some demonstrations magical,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That I may conjure in some lusty grove,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And have these joys in full possession.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then haste thee to some solitary grove,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And bear wise Bacon’s and Albertus’ works,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The Hebrew Psalter, and New Testament;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And whatsoever else is requisite

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: We will inform thee ere our conference cease.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Valdes, first let him know the words of art;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And then, all other ceremonies learn’d,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus may try his cunning by himself.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: First I’ll instruct thee in the rudiments,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And then wilt thou be perfecter than I.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then come and dine with me, and, after meat,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: We’ll canvass every quiddity thereof;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For, ere I sleep, I’ll try what I can do:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: This night I’ll conjure, though I die therefore.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I wonder what’s become of Faustus, that was wont

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: to make our schools ring with sic probo.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That shall we know, for see, here comes his boy.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How now, sirrah! where’s thy master?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: God in heaven knows.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, dost not thou know?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yes, I know; but that follows not.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Go to, sirrah! leave your jesting, and tell us

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: where he is.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That follows not necessary by force of argument, that you,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: being licentiates, should stand upon:  therefore acknowledge

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: your error, and be attentive.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, didst thou not say thou knewest?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Have you any witness on’t?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yes, sirrah, I heard you.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ask my fellow if I be a thief.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, you will not tell us?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yes, sir, I will tell you:  yet, if you were not dunces,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: you would never ask me such a question; for is not he corpus

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: naturale? and is not that mobile? then wherefore should you

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: ask me such a question?  But that I am by nature phlegmatic,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: slow to wrath, and prone to lechery (to love, I would say),

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: it were not for you to come within forty foot of the place

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: of execution, although I do not doubt to see you both hanged

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: the next sessions.  Thus having triumphed over you, I will set

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: my countenance like a precisian, and begin to speak thus:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Truly, my dear brethren, my master is within at dinner,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: with Valdes and Cornelius, as this wine, if it could speak,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: would inform your worships:  and so, the Lord bless you,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: preserve you, and keep you, my dear brethren, my dear brethren!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nay, then, I fear he is fallen into that damned art

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: for which they two are infamous through the world.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Were he a stranger, and not allied to me, yet should

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I grieve for him. But, come, let us go and inform the Rector,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and see if he by his grave counsel can reclaim him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, but I fear me nothing can reclaim him!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet let us try what we can do.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now that the gloomy shadow of the earth,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Longing to view Orion’s drizzling look,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Leaps from th’ antartic world unto the sky,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And dims the welkin with her pitchy breath,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus, begin thine incantations,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And try if devils will obey thy hest,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Seeing thou hast pray’d and sacrific’d to them.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Within this circle is Jehovah’s name,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Forward and backward anagrammatiz’d,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Th’ abbreviated names of holy saints,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Figures of every adjunct to the heavens,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And characters of signs and erring stars,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: By which the spirits are enforc’d to rise:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then fear not, Faustus, but be resolute,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And try the uttermost magic can perform.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sint mihi dei Acherontis propitii!  Valeat numen triplex Jehovoe!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ignei, aerii, aquatani spiritus, salvete!  Orientis princeps

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Belzebub, inferni ardentis monarcha, et Demogorgon, propitiamus

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: vos, ut appareat et surgat Mephistophilis, quod tumeraris:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: per Jehovam, Gehennam, et consecratam aquam quam nunc spargo,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: signumque crucis quod nunc facio, et per vota nostra, ipse nunc

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: surgat nobis dicatus Mephistophilis!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I charge thee to return, and change thy shape;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou art too ugly to attend on me:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Go, and return an old Franciscan friar;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That holy shape becomes a devil best.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I see there’s virtue in my heavenly words:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who would not be proficient in this art?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How pliant is this Mephistophilis,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Full of obedience and humility!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Such is the force of magic and my spells:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, Faustus, thou art conjuror laureat,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That canst command great Mephistophilis:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Quin regis Mephistophilis fratris imagine.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now, Faustus, what wouldst thou have me do?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I charge thee wait upon me whilst I live,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To do whatever Faustus shall command,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be it to make the moon drop from her sphere,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Or the ocean to overwhelm the world.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am a servant to great Lucifer,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And may not follow thee without his leave:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No more than he commands must we perform.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Did not he charge thee to appear to me?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, I came hither of mine own accord.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Did not my conjuring speeches raise thee? speak.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That was the cause, but yet per accidens;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For, when we hear one rack the name of God,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Abjure the Scriptures and his Saviour Christ,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: We fly, in hope to get his glorious soul;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nor will we come, unless he use such means

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whereby he is in danger to be damn’d.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Therefore the shortest cut for conjuring

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is stoutly to abjure the Trinity,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And pray devoutly to the prince of hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So Faustus hath

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Already done; and holds this principle,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: There is no chief but only Belzebub;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To whom Faustus doth dedicate himself.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: This word “damnation” terrifies not him,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For he confounds hell in Elysium:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: His ghost be with the old philosophers!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, leaving these vain trifles of men’s souls,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tell me what is that Lucifer thy lord?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Arch-regent and commander of all spirits.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Was not that Lucifer an angel once?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yes, Faustus, and most dearly lov’d of God.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How comes it, then, that he is prince of devils?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, by aspiring pride and insolence;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For which God threw him from the face of heaven.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And what are you that live with Lucifer?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Unhappy spirits that fell with Lucifer,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Conspir’d against our God with Lucifer,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And are for ever damn’d with Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Where are you damn’d?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How comes it, then, that thou art out of hell?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, this is hell, nor am I out of it:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Think’st thou that I, who saw the face of God,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And tasted the eternal joys of heaven,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Am not tormented with ten thousand hells,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In being depriv’d of everlasting bliss?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, Faustus, leave these frivolous demands,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Which strike a terror to my fainting soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What, is great Mephistophilis so passionate

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For being deprived of the joys of heaven?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Learn thou of Faustus manly fortitude,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And scorn those joys thou never shalt possess.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Go bear these tidings to great Lucifer:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Seeing Faustus hath incurr’d eternal death

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: By desperate thoughts against Jove’s deity,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Say, he surrenders up to him his soul,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So he will spare him four and twenty years,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Letting him live in all voluptuousness;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Having thee ever to attend on me,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To give me whatsoever I shall ask,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To tell me whatsoever I demand,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To slay mine enemies, and aid my friends,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And always be obedient to my will.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Go and return to mighty Lucifer,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And meet me in my study at midnight,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And then resolve me of thy master’s mind.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I will, Faustus.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Had I as many souls as there be stars,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’d give them all for Mephistophilis.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: By him I’ll be great emperor of the world,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And make a bridge thorough the moving air,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To pass the ocean with a band of men;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll join the hills that bind the Afric shore,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And make that country continent to Spain,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And both contributory to my crown:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The Emperor shall not live but by my leave,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nor any potentate of Germany.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now that I have obtain’d what I desir’d,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll live in speculation of this art,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Till Mephistophilis return again.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sirrah boy, come hither.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How, boy! swowns, boy!  I hope you have seen many boys

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: with such pickadevaunts as I have:  boy, quotha!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tell me, sirrah, hast thou any comings in?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, and goings out too; you may see else.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Alas, poor slave! see how poverty jesteth in his nakedness!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: the villain is bare and out of service, and so hungry, that I know

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: he would give his soul to the devil for a shoulder of mutton,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: though it were blood-raw.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How! my soul to the devil for a shoulder of mutton, though

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: ’twere blood-raw! not so, good friend:  by’r lady, I had need

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: have it well roasted, and good sauce to it, if I pay so dear.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, wilt thou serve me, and I’ll make thee go like

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Qui mihi discipulus?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How, in verse?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, sirrah; in beaten silk and staves-acre.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How, how, knaves-acre! ay, I thought that was all the land

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: his father left him.  Do you hear?  I would be sorry to rob you of

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: your living.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sirrah, I say in staves-acre.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Oho, oho, staves-acre! why, then, belike, if I were your

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: man, I should be full of vermin.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So thou shalt, whether thou beest with me or no.  But,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: sirrah, leave your jesting, and bind yourself presently unto me

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: for seven years, or I’ll turn all the lice about thee into

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: familiars, and they shall tear thee in pieces.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Do you hear, sir? you may save that labour; they are too

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: familiar with me already:  swowns, they are as bold with my flesh

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: as if they had paid for their meat and drink.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, do you hear, sirrah? hold, take these guilders.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Gridirons! what be they?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, French crowns.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Mass, but for the name of French crowns, a man were as good

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: have as many English counters.  And what should I do with these?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, now, sirrah, thou art at an hour’s warning, whensoever

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: or wheresoever the devil shall fetch thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, no; here, take your gridirons again.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Truly, I’ll none of them.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Truly, but you shall.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Bear witness I gave them him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Bear witness I give them you again.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, I will cause two devils presently to fetch thee

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: away.—Baliol and Belcher!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Let your Baliol and your Belcher come here, and I’ll

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: knock them, they were never so knocked since they were devils:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: say I should kill one of them, what would folks say?  “Do ye see

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: yonder tall fellow in the round slop? he has killed the devil.”

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So I should be called Kill-devil all the parish over.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Baliol and Belcher,—spirits, away!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What, are they gone? a vengeance on them! they have vile

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: long nails.  There was a he-devil and a she-devil:  I’ll tell you

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: how you shall know them; all he-devils has horns, and all

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: she-devils has clifts and cloven feet.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, sirrah, follow me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, do you hear? if I should serve you, would you teach

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: me to raise up Banios and Belcheos?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I will teach thee to turn thyself to any thing, to a dog,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: or a cat, or a mouse, or a rat, or any thing.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How! a Christian fellow to a dog, or a cat, a mouse,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: or a rat! no, no, sir; if you turn me into any thing, let it be

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: in the likeness of a little pretty frisking flea, that I may be

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: here and there and every where:  O, I’ll tickle the pretty wenches’

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: plackets!  I’ll be amongst them, i’faith.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, sirrah, come.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, do you hear, Wagner?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How!—Baliol and Belcher!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O Lord!  I pray, sir, let Banio and Belcher go sleep.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Villain, call me Master Wagner, and let thy left eye be

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: diametarily fixed upon my right heel, with quasi vestigiis

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: nostris insistere.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: God forgive me, he speaks Dutch fustian.  Well, I’ll follow

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: him; I’ll serve him, that’s flat.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now, Faustus, must

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou needs be damn’d, and canst thou not be sav’d:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What boots it, then, to think of God or heaven?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Away with such vain fancies, and despair;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Despair in God, and trust in Belzebub:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now go not backward; no, Faustus, be resolute:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why waver’st thou?  O, something soundeth in mine ears,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: “Abjure this magic, turn to God again!”

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, and Faustus will turn to God again.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To God? he loves thee not;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The god thou serv’st is thine own appetite,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Wherein is fix’d the love of Belzebub:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To him I’ll build an altar and a church,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And offer lukewarm blood of new-born babes.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sweet Faustus, leave that execrable art.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Contrition, prayer, repentance—what of them?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, they are means to bring thee unto heaven!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Rather illusions, fruits of lunacy,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That make men foolish that do trust them most.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sweet Faustus, think of heaven and heavenly things.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, Faustus; think of honour and of wealth.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Of wealth!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, the signiory of Embden shall be mine.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: When Mephistophilis shall stand by me,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What god can hurt thee, Faustus? thou art safe

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Cast no more doubts.—Come, Mephistophilis,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And bring glad tidings from great Lucifer;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is’t not midnight?—come, Mephistophilis,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Veni, veni, Mephistophile!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now tell me what says Lucifer, thy lord?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That I shall wait on Faustus whilst he lives,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So he will buy my service with his soul.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Already Faustus hath hazarded that for thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, Faustus, thou must bequeath it solemnly,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And write a deed of gift with thine own blood;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For that security craves great Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If thou deny it, I will back to hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Stay, Mephistophilis, and tell me, what good will my soul

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: do thy lord?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Enlarge his kingdom.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is that the reason why he tempts us thus?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Solamen miseris socios habuisse doloris.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, have you any pain that torture others!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As great as have the human souls of men.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, tell me, Faustus, shall I have thy soul?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And I will be thy slave, and wait on thee,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And give thee more than thou hast wit to ask.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, Mephistophilis, I give it thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then, Faustus, stab thine arm courageously,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And bind thy soul, that at some certain day

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Great Lucifer may claim it as his own;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And then be thou as great as Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lo, Mephistophilis, for love of thee,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I cut mine arm, and with my proper blood

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Assure my soul to be great Lucifer’s,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Chief lord and regent of perpetual night!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: View here the blood that trickles from mine arm,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And let it be propitious for my wish.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, Faustus, thou must

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Write it in manner of a deed of gift.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, so I will .  But, Mephistophilis,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My blood congeals, and I can write no more.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll fetch thee fire to dissolve it straight.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What might the staying of my blood portend?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is it unwilling I should write this bill?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why streams it not, that I may write afresh?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: FAUSTUS GIVES TO THEE HIS SOUL:  ah, there it stay’d!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why shouldst thou not? is not thy soul shine own?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then write again, FAUSTUS GIVES TO THEE HIS SOUL.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here’s fire; come, Faustus, set it on.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So, now the blood begins to clear again;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now will I make an end immediately.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, what will not I do to obtain his soul?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Consummatum est; this bill is ended,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And Faustus hath bequeath’d his soul to Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But what is this inscription on mine arm?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Homo, fuge:  whither should I fly?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If unto God, he’ll throw me down to hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My senses are deceiv’d; here’s nothing writ:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I see it plain; here in this place is writ,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Homo, fuge:  yet shall not Faustus fly.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll fetch him somewhat to delight his mind.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Speak, Mephistophilis, what means this show?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nothing, Faustus, but to delight thy mind withal,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And to shew thee what magic can perform.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But may I raise up spirits when I please?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, Faustus, and do greater things than these.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then there’s enough for a thousand souls.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here, Mephistophilis, receive this scroll,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A deed of gift of body and of soul:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But yet conditionally that thou perform

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: All articles prescrib’d between us both.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus, I swear by hell and Lucifer

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To effect all promises between us made!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then hear me read them.   ON THESE CONDITIONS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: FIRST, THAT FAUSTUS MAY BE A SPIRIT IN FORM AND

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: SECONDLY, THAT MEPHISTOPHILIS SHALL BE HIS SERVANT,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: THIRDLY, THAT MEPHISTOPHILIS SHALL DO FOR HIM,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
character: AND BRING HIM WHATSOEVER HE DESIRES
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: FOURTHLY, THAT HE SHALL

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
character: BE IN HIS CHAMBER OR HOUSE INVISIBLE
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: LASTLY, THAT HE SHALL APPEAR

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
character: BE IN HIS CHAMBER OR HOUSE INVISIBLE
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: TO THE SAID JOHN FAUSTUS, AT ALL TIMES, IN WHAT FORM OR SHAPE

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I, JOHN FAUSTUS, OF WERTENBERG, DOCTOR, BY

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: THESE PRESENTS, DO GIVE BOTH BODY AND SOUL TO LUCIFER PRINCE OF

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: THE EAST, AND HIS MINISTER MEPHISTOPHILIS; AND FURTHERMORE GRANT

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: UNTO THEM, THAT, TWENTY-FOUR YEARS BEING EXPIRED, THE ARTICLES

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: ABOVE-WRITTEN INVIOLATE, FULL POWER TO FETCH OR CARRY THE SAID

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: JOHN FAUSTUS, BODY AND SOUL, FLESH, BLOOD, OR GOODS, INTO THEIR

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: BY ME, JOHN FAUSTUS.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Speak, Faustus, do you deliver this as your deed?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, take it, and the devil give thee good on’t!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now, Faustus, ask what thou wilt.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: First will I question with thee about hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tell me, where is the place that men call hell?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Under the heavens.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, but whereabout?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Within the bowels of these elements,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Where we are tortur’d and remain for ever:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hell hath no limits, nor is circumscrib’d

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In one self place; for where we are is hell,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And where hell is, there must we ever be:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And, to conclude, when all the world dissolves,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And every creature shall be purified,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: All places shall be hell that are not heaven.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, I think hell’s a fable.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, think so still, till experience change thy mind.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, think’st thou, then, that Faustus shall be damn’d?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, of necessity, for here’s the scroll

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Wherein thou hast given thy soul to Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, and body too:  but what of that?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Think’st thou that Faustus is so fond to imagine

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That, after this life, there is any pain?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tush, these are trifles and mere old wives’ tales.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, Faustus, I am an instance to prove the contrary,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For I am damn’d, and am now in hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How! now in hell!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nay, an this be hell, I’ll willingly be damn’d here:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What! walking, disputing, &c.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, leaving off this, let me have a wife,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The fairest maid in Germany;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
