text: For I am wanton and lascivious,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And cannot live without a wife.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How! a wife!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I prithee, Faustus, talk not of a wife.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nay, sweet Mephistophilis, fetch me one, for I will have

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: one.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, thou wilt have one?  Sit there till I come:  I’ll

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: fetch thee a wife in the devil’s name.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tell me, Faustus, how dost thou like thy wife?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A plague on her for a hot whore!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tut, Faustus,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Marriage is but a ceremonial toy;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If thou lovest me, think no more of it.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll cull thee out the fairest courtezans,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And bring them every morning to thy bed:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: She whom thine eye shall like, thy heart shall have,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be she as chaste as was Penelope,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As wise as Saba, or as beautiful

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As was bright Lucifer before his fall.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hold, take this book, peruse it thoroughly:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The iterating of these lines brings gold;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The framing of this circle on the ground

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Brings whirlwinds, tempests, thunder, and lightning;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Pronounce this thrice devoutly to thyself,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And men in armour shall appear to thee,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ready to execute what thou desir’st.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thanks, Mephistophilis:  yet fain would I have a book

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: wherein I might behold all spells and incantations, that I

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: might raise up spirits when I please.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here they are in this book.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now would I have a book where I might see all characters

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and planets of the heavens, that I might know their motions and

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: dispositions.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here they are too.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nay, let me have one book more,—and then I have done,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: wherein I might see all plants, herbs, and trees, that grow upon

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: the earth.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here they be.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, thou art deceived.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tut, I warrant thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: When I behold the heavens, then I repent,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And curse thee, wicked Mephistophilis,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Because thou hast depriv’d me of those joys.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, Faustus,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thinkest thou heaven is such a glorious thing?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I tell thee, ’tis not half so fair as thou,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Or any man that breathes on earth.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How prov’st thou that?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: ’Twas made for man, therefore is man more excellent.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If it were made for man, ’twas made for me:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I will renounce this magic and repent.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus, repent; yet God will pity thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou art a spirit; God cannot pity thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who buzzeth in mine ears I am a spirit?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be I a devil, yet God may pity me;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, God will pity me, if I repent.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, but Faustus never shall repent.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My heart’s so harden’d, I cannot repent:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Scarce can I name salvation, faith, or heaven,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But fearful echoes thunder in mine ears,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: “Faustus, thou art damn’d!” then swords, and knives,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Poison, guns, halters, and envenom’d steel

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Are laid before me to despatch myself;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And long ere this I should have slain myself,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Had not sweet pleasure conquer’d deep despair.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Have not I made blind Homer sing to me

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Of Alexander’s love and Oenon’s death?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And hath not he, that built the walls of Thebes

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: With ravishing sound of his melodious harp,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Made music with my Mephistophilis?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why should I die, then, or basely despair?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am resolv’d; Faustus shall ne’er repent.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, Mephistophilis, let us dispute again,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And argue of divine astrology.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tell me, are there many heavens above the moon

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Are all celestial bodies but one globe,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As is the substance of this centric earth?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As are the elements, such are the spheres,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Mutually folded in each other’s orb,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And, Faustus,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: All jointly move upon one axletree,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose terminine is term’d the world’s wide pole;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nor are the names of Saturn, Mars, or Jupiter

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Feign’d, but are erring stars.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, tell me, have they all one motion, both situ et

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: tempore?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: All jointly move from east to west in twenty-four hours

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: upon the poles of the world; but differ in their motion upon

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: the poles of the zodiac.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tush,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: These slender trifles Wagner can decide:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hath Mephistophilis no greater skill?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who knows not the double motion of the planets?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The first is finish’d in a natural day;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The second thus; as Saturn in thirty years; Jupiter in twelve;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Mars in four; the Sun, Venus, and Mercury in a year; the Moon in

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: twenty-eight days.  Tush, these are freshmen’s suppositions.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But, tell me, hath every sphere a dominion or intelligentia?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How many heavens or spheres are there?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nine; the seven planets, the firmament, and the empyreal

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: heaven.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, resolve me in this question; why have we not

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: conjunctions, oppositions, aspects, eclipses, all at one time,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: but in some years we have more, in some less?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Per inoequalem motum respectu totius.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Well, I am answered.  Tell me who made the world?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I will not.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sweet Mephistophilis, tell me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Move me not, for I will not tell thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Villain, have I not bound thee to tell me any thing?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, that is not against our kingdom; but this is.  Think

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: thou on hell, Faustus, for thou art damned.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Think, Faustus, upon God that made the world.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Remember this.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, go, accursed spirit, to ugly hell!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: ’Tis thou hast damn’d distressed Faustus’ soul.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Is’t not too late?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Too late.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Never too late, if Faustus can repent.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If thou repent, devils shall tear thee in pieces.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Repent, and they shall never raze thy skin.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, Christ, my Saviour,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Seek to save distressed Faustus’ soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Christ cannot save thy soul, for he is just:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: There’s none but I have interest in the same.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, who art thou that look’st so terrible?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am Lucifer,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And this is my companion-prince in hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, Faustus, they are come to fetch away thy soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: We come to tell thee thou dost injure us;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou talk’st of Christ, contrary to thy promise:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou shouldst not think of God:  think of the devil,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And of his dam too.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nor will I henceforth:  pardon me in this,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And Faustus vows never to look to heaven,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Never to name God, or to pray to him,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To burn his Scriptures, slay his ministers,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And make my spirits pull his churches down.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Do so, and we will highly gratify thee.  Faustus, we are

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: come from hell to shew thee some pastime:  sit down, and thou

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: shalt see all the Seven Deadly Sins appear in their proper shapes.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That sight will be as pleasing unto me,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As Paradise was to Adam, the first day

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Of his creation.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Talk not of Paradise nor creation; but mark this show:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: talk of the devil, and nothing else.—Come away!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now, Faustus, examine them of their several names and dispositions.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What art thou, the first?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am Pride.  I disdain to have any parents.  I am like to

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ovid’s flea; I can creep into every corner of a wench; sometimes,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: like a perriwig, I sit upon her brow; or, like a fan of feathers,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I kiss her lips; indeed, I do—what do I not?  But, fie, what a

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: scent is here!  I’ll not speak another word, except the ground

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: were perfumed, and covered with cloth of arras.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What art thou, the second?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am Covetousness, begotten of an old churl, in an

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: old leathern bag:  and, might I have my wish, I would desire that

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: this house and all the people in it were turned to gold, that I

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: might lock you up in my good chest:  O, my sweet gold!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What art thou, the third?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am Wrath.  I had neither father nor mother:  I leapt out

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: of a lion’s mouth when I was scarce half-an-hour old; and ever

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: since I have run up and down the world with this case

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: of rapiers, wounding myself when I had nobody to fight withal.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I was born in hell; and look to it, for some of you shall be

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: my father.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What art thou, the fourth?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am Envy, begotten of a chimney-sweeper and an oyster-wife.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I cannot read, and therefore wish all books were burnt.  I am lean

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: with seeing others eat.  O, that there would come a famine through

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: all the world, that all might die, and I live alone! then thou

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: shouldst see how fat I would be.  But must thou sit, and I stand?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: come down, with a vengeance!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Away, envious rascal!—What art thou, the fifth?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who I, sir?  I am Gluttony.  My parents are all dead,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and the devil a penny they have left me, but a bare pension, and

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: that is thirty meals a-day and ten bevers,—a small trifle

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: to suffice nature.  O, I come of a royal parentage! my grandfather

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: was a Gammon of Bacon, my grandmother a Hogshead of Claret-wine;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: my godfathers were these, Peter Pickle-herring and Martin

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Martlemas-beef; O, but my godmother, she was a jolly gentlewoman,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and well-beloved in every good town and city; her name was Mistress

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Margery March-beer.  Now, Faustus, thou hast heard all my progeny;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: wilt thou bid me to supper?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, I’ll see thee hanged:  thou wilt eat up all my victuals.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then the devil choke thee!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Choke thyself, glutton!—What art thou, the sixth?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am Sloth.  I was begotten on a sunny bank, where I have

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: lain ever since; and you have done me great injury to bring me

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: from thence:  let me be carried thither again by Gluttony and

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lechery.  I’ll not speak another word for a king’s ransom.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What are you, Mistress Minx, the seventh and last?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who I, sir?  I am one that loves an inch of raw mutton

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: better than an ell of fried stock-fish; and the first letter

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: of my name begins with L.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Away, to hell, to hell!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now, Faustus, how dost thou like this?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, this feeds my soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tut, Faustus, in hell is all manner of delight.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, might I see hell, and return again,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How happy were I then!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou shalt; I will send for thee at midnight.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In meantime take this book; peruse it throughly,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And thou shalt turn thyself into what shape thou wilt.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Great thanks, mighty Lucifer!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: This will I keep as chary as my life.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Farewell, Faustus, and think on the devil.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Farewell, great Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, Mephistophilis.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Learned Faustus,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To know the secrets of astronomy

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Graven in the book of Jove’s high firmament,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Did mount himself to scale Olympus’ top,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Being seated in a chariot burning bright,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Drawn by the strength of yoky dragons’ necks.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: He now is gone to prove cosmography,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And, as I guess, will first arrive at Rome,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To see the Pope and manner of his court,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And take some part of holy Peter’s feast,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That to this day is highly solemniz’d.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Having now, my good Mephistophilis,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Pass’d with delight the stately town of Trier,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Environ’d round with airy mountain-tops,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: With walls of flint, and deep-entrenched lakes,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Not to be won by any conquering prince;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: From Paris next, coasting the realm of France,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: We saw the river Maine fall into Rhine,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose banks are set with groves of fruitful vines;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then up to Naples, rich Campania,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose buildings fair and gorgeous to the eye,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The streets straight forth, and pav’d with finest brick,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I swear to thee, by the honour of mine imperial crown, that,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: whatever thou doest, thou shalt be no ways prejudiced or endamaged.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My gracious sovereign, though I must confess myself far

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: shall command me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then, Doctor Faustus, mark what I shall say.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As I was sometime solitary set

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Within my closet, sundry thoughts arose

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: About the honour of mine ancestors,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How they had won by prowess such exploits,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Got such riches, subdu’d so many kingdoms,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As we that do succeed, or they that shall

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hereafter possess our throne, shall

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: (I fear me) ne’er attain to that degree

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Of high renown and great authority:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Amongst which kings is Alexander the Great,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Chief spectacle of the world’s pre-eminence,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The bright shining of whose glorious acts

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lightens the world with his reflecting beams,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As when I hear but motion made of him,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: It grieves my soul I never saw the man:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If, therefore, thou, by cunning of thine art,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Canst raise this man from hollow vaults below,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Where lies entomb’d this famous conqueror,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And bring with him his beauteous paramour,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Both in their right shapes, gesture, and attire

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: They us’d to wear during their time of life,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou shalt both satisfy my just desire,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And give me cause to praise thee whilst I live.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My gracious lord, I am ready to accomplish your request,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: so far forth as by art and power of my spirit I am able to perform.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’faith, that’s just nothing at all.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: to present before your eyes the true substantial bodies of those

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

text: Ay, marry, Master Doctor, now there’s a sign of grace in

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

text: you, when you will confess the truth.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

text: But such spirits as can lively resemble Alexander and

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: his paramour shall appear before your grace, in that manner that

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: they both lived in, in their most flourishing estate; which

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I doubt not shall sufficiently content your imperial majesty.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Go to, Master Doctor; let me see them presently.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Do you hear, Master Doctor? you bring Alexander and his

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: paramour before the Emperor!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How then, sir?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’faith, that’s as true as Diana turned me to a stag.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, sir; but, when Actaeon died, he left the horns for

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

text: you.—Mephistophilis, be gone.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Nay, an you go to conjuring, I’ll be gone.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll meet with you anon for interrupting me so.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

text: Your highness may boldly go and see.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sure, these are no spirits, but the true substantial

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: bodies of those two deceased princes.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Wilt please your highness now to send for the knight

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

text: that was so pleasant with me here of late?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: you remembered how you crossed me in my conference with the

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

text: Shortening my days and thread of vital life,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Alas, sir, I have no more!—I pray you, speak for

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
