act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thy fatal time doth draw to final end;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Despair doth drive distrust into my thoughts:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Confound these passions with a quiet sleep:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tush, Christ did call the thief upon the Cross;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then rest thee, Faustus, quiet in conceit.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Alas, alas!  Doctor Fustian, quoth a? mass, Doctor

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lopus was never such a doctor:  has given me a purgation, has

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: purged me of forty dollars; I shall never see them more.  But yet,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: like an ass as I was, I would not be ruled by him, for he bade me

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I should ride him into no water:  now I, thinking my horse had had

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: some rare quality that he would not have had me know of, I,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: like a venturous youth, rid him into the deep pond at the town’s

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: end.  I was no sooner in the middle of the pond, but my horse

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: vanished away, and I sat upon a bottle of hay, never so near

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: drowning in my life.  But I’ll seek out my doctor, and have my

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: forty dollars again, or I’ll make it the dearest horse!—O,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: yonder is his snipper-snapper.—Do you hear? you, hey-pass,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: where’s your master?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, sir, what would you? you cannot speak with him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But I will speak with him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, he’s fast asleep:  come some other time.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll speak with him now, or I’ll break his

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: glass-windows about his ears.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I tell thee, he has not slept this eight nights.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: An he have not slept this eight weeks, I’ll

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: speak with him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: See, where he is, fast asleep.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, this is he.—God save you, Master Doctor,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Master Doctor, Master Doctor Fustian! forty dollars, forty dollars

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: for a bottle of hay!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why, thou seest he hears thee not.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So-ho, ho! so-ho, ho!    No,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: will you not wake?  I’ll make you wake ere I go.  [Pulls FAUSTUS

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: by the leg, and pulls it away.]  Alas, I am undone! what shall

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I do?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, my leg, my leg!—Help, Mephistophilis! call the

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: officers.—My leg, my leg!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, villain, to the constable.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O Lord, sir, let me go, and I’ll give you forty

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: dollars more!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Where be they?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I have none about me:  come to my ostry,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and I’ll give them you.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be gone quickly.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What, is he gone? farewell he!  Faustus has his leg again,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and the Horse-courser, I take it, a bottle of hay for his labour:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: well, this trick shall cost him forty dollars more.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: How now, Wagner! what’s the news with thee?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sir, the Duke of Vanholt doth earnestly entreat your

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: company.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The Duke of Vanholt! an honourable gentleman, to whom

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I must be no niggard of my cunning.—Come, Mephistophilis,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: let’s away to him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Believe me, Master Doctor, this merriment hath much pleased

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My gracious lord, I am glad it contents you so well.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: —But it may be, madam, you take no delight in this.  I have heard

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: that great-bellied women do long for some dainties or other:  what

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: is it, madam? tell me, and you shall have it.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thanks, good Master Doctor:  and, for I see your courteous

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: intent to pleasure me, I will not hide from you the thing my heart

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: desires; and, were it now summer, as it is January and the dead

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: time of the winter, I would desire no better meat than a dish

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: of ripe grapes.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Alas, madam, that’s nothing!—Mephistophilis, be gone.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Were it a greater thing than this, so it

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: would content you, you should have it.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here they be, madam:  wilt please you taste on them?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Believe me, Master Doctor, this makes me wonder above the

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: rest, that being in the dead time of winter and in the month of

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: January, how you should come by these grapes.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If it like your grace, the year is divided into two

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: circles over the whole world, that, when it is here winter with

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: us, in the contrary circle it is summer with them, as in India,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Saba, and farther countries in the east; and by means of a

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: swift spirit that I have, I had them brought hither, as you see.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: —How do you like them, madam? be they good?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Believe me, Master Doctor, they be the best grapes that

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: e’er I tasted in my life before.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I am glad they content you so, madam.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, madam, let us in, where you must well reward this

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: learned man for the great kindness he hath shewed to you.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And so I will, my lord; and, whilst I live, rest

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: beholding for this courtesy.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I humbly thank your grace.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, Master Doctor, follow us, and receive your reward.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I think my master means to die shortly,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For he hath given to me all his goods:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And yet, methinks, if that death were near,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: He would not banquet, and carouse, and swill

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Amongst the students, as even now he doth,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who are at supper with such belly-cheer

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As Wagner ne’er beheld in all his life.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: See, where they come! belike the feast is ended.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Master Doctor Faustus, since our conference about

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: fair ladies, which was the beautifulest in all the world, we have

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: determined with ourselves that Helen of Greece was the admirablest

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: lady that ever lived:  therefore, Master Doctor, if you will do us

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: that favour, as to let us see that peerless dame of Greece, whom

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: all the world admires for majesty, we should think ourselves much

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: beholding unto you.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Gentlemen,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For that I know your friendship is unfeign’d,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And Faustus’ custom is not to deny

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The just requests of those that wish him well,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: You shall behold that peerless dame of Greece,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No otherways for pomp and majesty

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Than when Sir Paris cross’d the seas with her,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And brought the spoils to rich Dardania.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Be silent, then, for danger is in words.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Too simple is my wit to tell her praise,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whom all the world admires for majesty.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No marvel though the angry Greeks pursu’d

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: With ten years’ war the rape of such a queen,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose heavenly beauty passeth all compare.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Since we have seen the pride of Nature’s works,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And only paragon of excellence,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Let us depart; and for this glorious deed

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Happy and blest be Faustus evermore!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Gentlemen, farewell:  the same I wish to you.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, Doctor Faustus, that I might prevail

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To guide thy steps unto the way of life,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: By which sweet path thou mayst attain the goal

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That shall conduct thee to celestial rest!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Break heart, drop blood, and mingle it with tears,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tears falling from repentant heaviness

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Of thy most vile and loathsome filthiness,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The stench whereof corrupts the inward soul

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: With such flagitious crimes of heinous sin

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As no commiseration may expel,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But mercy, Faustus, of thy Saviour sweet,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose blood alone must wash away thy guilt.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Where art thou, Faustus? wretch, what hast thou done?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Damn’d art thou, Faustus, damn’d; despair and die!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hell calls for right, and with a roaring voice

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Says, “Faustus, come; thine hour is almost come;”

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And Faustus now will come to do thee right.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, stay, good Faustus, stay thy desperate steps!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I see an angel hovers o’er thy head,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And, with a vial full of precious grace,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Offers to pour the same into thy soul:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then call for mercy, and avoid despair.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, my sweet friend, I feel

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thy words to comfort my distressed soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Leave me a while to ponder on my sins.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I go, sweet Faustus; but with heavy cheer,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Fearing the ruin of thy hopeless soul.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Accursed Faustus, where is mercy now?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I do repent; and yet I do despair:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hell strives with grace for conquest in my breast:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What shall I do to shun the snares of death?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Thou traitor, Faustus, I arrest thy soul

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For disobedience to my sovereign lord:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Revolt, or I’ll in piece-meal tear thy flesh.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sweet Mephistophilis, entreat thy lord

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To pardon my unjust presumption,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And with my blood again I will confirm

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My former vow I made to Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Do it, then, quickly, with unfeigned heart,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lest greater danger do attend thy drift.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Torment, sweet friend, that base and crooked age,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That durst dissuade me from thy Lucifer,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: With greatest torments that our hell affords.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: His faith is great; I cannot touch his soul;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But what I may afflict his body with

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I will attempt, which is but little worth.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: One thing, good servant, let me crave of thee,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To glut the longing of my heart’s desire,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That I might have unto my paramour

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That heavenly Helen which I saw of late,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose sweet embracings may extinguish clean

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Those thoughts that do dissuade me from my vow,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And keep mine oath I made to Lucifer.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus, this, or what else thou shalt desire,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Shall be perform’d in twinkling of an eye.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Was this the face that launch’d a thousand ships,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And burnt the topless towers of Ilium

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Sweet Helen, make me immortal with a kiss.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Her lips suck forth my soul:  see, where it flies!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Come, Helen, come, give me my soul again.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Here will I dwell, for heaven is in these lips,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And all is dross that is not Helena.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I will be Paris, and for love of thee,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Instead of Troy, shall Wertenberg be sack’d;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And I will combat with weak Menelaus,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And wear thy colours on my plumed crest;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yea, I will wound Achilles in the heel,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And then return to Helen for a kiss.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, thou art fairer than the evening air

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Clad in the beauty of a thousand stars;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Brighter art thou than flaming Jupiter

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: When he appear’d to hapless Semele;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: More lovely than the monarch of the sky

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: In wanton Arethusa’s azur’d arms;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And none but thou shalt be my paramour!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Accursed Faustus, miserable man,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That from thy soul exclud’st the grace of heaven,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And fly’st the throne of his tribunal-seat!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Satan begins to sift me with his pride:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: As in this furnace God shall try my faith,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My faith, vile hell, shall triumph over thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ambitious fiends, see how the heavens smile

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: At your repulse, and laugh your state to scorn!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Hence, hell! for hence I fly unto my God.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, gentlemen!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What ails Faustus?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, my sweet chamber-fellow, had I lived with thee,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: then had I lived still! but now I die eternally.  Look, comes

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: he not? comes he not?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: What means Faustus?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Belike he is grown into some sickness by being

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: over-solitary.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If it be so, we’ll have physicians to cure him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: —’Tis but a surfeit; never fear, man.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A surfeit of deadly sin, that hath damned both body

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and soul.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet, Faustus, look up to heaven; remember God’s

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: mercies are infinite.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But Faustus’ offence can ne’er be pardoned:  the serpent

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: that tempted Eve may be saved, but not Faustus.  Ah, gentlemen,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: hear me with patience, and tremble not at my speeches!  Though

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: my heart pants and quivers to remember that I have been a student

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: here these thirty years, O, would I had never seen Wertenberg,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: never read book! and what wonders I have done, all Germany can

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: witness, yea, all the world; for which Faustus hath lost both

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Germany and the world, yea, heaven itself, heaven, the seat of

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: God, the throne of the blessed, the kingdom of joy; and must

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: remain in hell for ever, hell, ah, hell, for ever!  Sweet friends,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: what shall become of Faustus, being in hell for ever?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet, Faustus, call on God.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: On God, whom Faustus hath abjured! on God, whom Faustus

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: hath blasphemed!  Ah, my God, I would weep! but the devil draws in

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: my tears.  Gush forth blood, instead of tears! yea, life and soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, he stays my tongue!  I would lift up my hands; but see, they

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: hold them, they hold them!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Who, Faustus?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Lucifer and Mephistophilis.  Ah, gentlemen, I gave them

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: my soul for my cunning!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: God forbid!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: God forbade it, indeed; but Faustus hath done it:  for

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: vain pleasure of twenty-four years hath Faustus lost eternal joy

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: and felicity.  I writ them a bill with mine own blood:  the date

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: is expired; the time will come, and he will fetch me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why did not Faustus tell us of this before,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: that divines might have prayed for thee?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Oft have I thought to have done so; but the devil

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: threatened to tear me in pieces, if I named God, to fetch both

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: body and soul, if I once gave ear to divinity:  and now ’tis too

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: late.  Gentlemen, away, lest you perish with me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, what shall we do to save Faustus?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Talk not of me, but save yourselves, and depart.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: God will strengthen me; I will stay with Faustus.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Tempt not God, sweet friend; but let us into the

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: next room, and there pray for him.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ay, pray for me, pray for me; and what noise soever

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: ye hear, come not unto me, for nothing can rescue me.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Pray thou, and we will pray that God may have

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: mercy upon thee.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Gentlemen, farewell:  if I live till morning, I’ll visit

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: you; if not, Faustus is gone to hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus, farewell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, Faustus,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now hast thou but one bare hour to live,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And then thou must be damn’d perpetually!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Stand still, you ever-moving spheres of heaven,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That time may cease, and midnight never come;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Fair Nature’s eye, rise, rise again, and make

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Perpetual day; or let this hour be but

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A year, a month, a week, a natural day,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That Faustus may repent and save his soul!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O lente, lente currite, noctis equi!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The stars move still, time runs, the clock will strike,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: The devil will come, and Faustus must be damn’d.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, I’ll leap up to my God!—Who pulls me down?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: See, see, where Christ’s blood streams in the firmament!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: One drop would save my soul, half a drop:  ah, my Christ!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, rend not my heart for naming of my Christ!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet will I call on him:  O, spare me, Lucifer!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Where is it now? ’tis gone:  and see, where God

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Stretcheth out his arm, and bends his ireful brows!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Mountains and hills, come, come, and fall on me,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And hide me from the heavy wrath of God!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, no!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Then will I headlong run into the earth:

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Earth, gape!  O, no, it will not harbour me!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: You stars that reign’d at my nativity,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose influence hath allotted death and hell,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Now draw up Faustus, like a foggy mist.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Into the entrails of yon labouring cloud,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That, when you vomit forth into the air,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My limbs may issue from your smoky mouths,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: So that my soul may but ascend to heaven!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, half the hour is past! ’twill all be past anon

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O God,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: If thou wilt not have mercy on my soul,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Yet for Christ’s sake, whose blood hath ransom’d me,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Impose some end to my incessant pain;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Let Faustus live in hell a thousand years,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: A hundred thousand, and at last be sav’d!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, no end is limited to damned souls!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Why wert thou not a creature wanting soul?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Or why is this immortal that thou hast?

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ah, Pythagoras’ metempsychosis, were that true,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: This soul should fly from me, and I be chang’d

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Unto some brutish beast! all beasts are happy,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: For, when they die,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Their souls are soon dissolv’d in elements;

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: But mine must live still to be plagu’d in hell.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Curs’d be the parents that engender’d me!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: No, Faustus, curse thyself, curse Lucifer

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That hath depriv’d thee of the joys of heaven.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O, it strikes, it strikes!  Now, body, turn to air,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Or Lucifer will bear thee quick to hell!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: O soul, be chang’d into little water-drops,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And fall into the ocean, ne’er be found!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: My God, my god, look not so fierce on me!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Adders and serpents, let me breathe a while!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Ugly hell, gape not! come not, Lucifer!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: I’ll burn my books!—Ah, Mephistophilis!

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Cut is the branch that might have grown full straight,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: And burned is Apollo’s laurel-bough,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: That sometime grew within this learned man.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Faustus is gone:  regard his hellish fall,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose fiendful fortune may exhort the wise,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Only to wonder at unlawful things,

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Whose deepness doth entice such forward wits

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: To practice more than heavenly power permits.

play_name: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
act: THE TRAGICAL HISTORY OF DOCTOR FAUSTUS
text: Terminat hora diem; terminat auctor opus.
